name: Starting Memories (DEMO)
description:
LOOKING FOR HELPERS TO FURTHER IMPROVE THE STORY

NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN

NOT SUITABLE FOR PEOPLE WHO GET EASILY SCARED

Hello! Come and join our story as Kyler (you) moves schools and meets his two new besties Maya and Jayla! Get to know them! Spend time with them! 

And one day youʻll make a memorable romantic memory!

This game does indeed have Doki Doki vibes to it the more you play...

Please give me feedback about this demo, this is my first ever visual novel and I have NO experience with coding, so bear with me. You can give me feedback about anything, what Iʻm most interested in hearing from you is how you like the storyline!

I made this all by myself so please support me!!

For any private questions about the game, please contact me: kamakahaloihoola@gmail.com

Thank youuu! Please play the whole game.

The whole demo is about 30 mins, this wont be the official story, so expect some additional dialogues in the full release that werenʻt in the demo :)
